titleInfo.title: Wall Painting, Heavenly Bull and Seven Cows, Tomb of Nefertiri

mods.abstract: Tomb of Nefertiti (New Kingdom - Dynasty XIX) wall painting of heavenly bull and seven cows; eight mythological bovine of different colors in profile face offering tables (right); hieroglyphs above and below each painted figure; untitled print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
